title: Compare 17th and 20th cent. absolute power methods

content.question:
Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure you are best prepared prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. 

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.
Compare and contrast the ways that seventeenth-century absolute monarchs and twentieth-century dictators gained and maintained their power.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
